title: Let's Play Reverse Q&A: Round #2!
body:
Welcome to reverse Q&A â€” where the questions and answers are all about your choice!

The rules are simple: I'll ask a question and you answer with your pick. The question will be 'this' or 'that' format. Reply to the poll with your choice and then feel free to provide context in the comments on why you picked it!

replies.body:
Oh, man, this is way harder than the first one! :S

I guess I have to go with cake, because they're harder to mess up, and you can't have an ice cream pie or a cheesepie.
Cheesecake is borderline. It's that gray area of pie and something else... I'm watching you Cheesecake.
Cheesecake is watching you..
The cake is a lie; the pie is a fake.

If ice cream cakes didn't exist, I'd be hard-pressed to go with cake.

But ice cream cakes exist, sooooooooo

Sometimes when you eat cake, the frosting becomes too much :x I voted pie. Because you can't have a marionberry or apple cake.  but you can have apple crisp pie with melted ice cream and jfdksl;fjds <3

And then I found this delicious abomination: 

http://www.moderndomestic.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/5120052273_de5af8cd82.jpg

It's cake-pie.
I have no idea where to start eating that... Thing. Top down maybe or 3-layer scoops?
Cake. Yummy. Me like.

The cake is a lie, and the lie is a cake.

Pie triumphs over all.

I've never actually liked cake. To the point where my parents used to have to get creative for my birthday. I will never forget the birthday 'cake' that was made entirely of Krispy Kreme Donuts, RIP (3/8/2000-3/8/2000).

Pie for life!!

"Cake or pie?" "Yes."

Who said this was an exclusive OR?
This is all about the tough choices!
I choose cake,i think they are more delicious and i love cheese cake
- All of the above (RiotGirlPlz)!
Depends on the cake/pie. For example a pumpkin cheese cake or a  birthday cake are just as good as an apple pie :)
Cake is too heavy. Pie has fruit aspects which make it a healthier choice as well.

I think Paul F. Tompkins summed it up best:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CmOkXV-S1zQ&feature=kp
Cake, pie is a lot easier to mess up while the only thing I've never liked on a cake is the frosting usually
If the cake is a cookie cake, that's always the answer. My god, cookie cakes are like the best thing ever. asdfsdsdgfdgfsds

Depends on the mood and the weather.

On a hot day, nothing beats a cheesecake, but on a rainy day, a nice pie just hits the spot

I see a lot of comments about cake being heavier than pie, but in my experience it depends on the recipe. I've had a lot of pies that are far heavier than most cakes I've had and vice versa. A large factor in how heavy a cake is typically is dependent on how much frosting the creator chose to use, and how heavy that is, rather than the cake itself, as well as all the other stuff put on top of it. I myself am very fond of a classic cheese cake as well as Chinese fruit cake (which isn't heavy at all imo). The only pie I really like is apple, so I voted cake.
Pie has way more texture, tastes so much better because it isn't so hefty, and pie doesn't make you feel fat after.
